casebody.data:
No. 10-37. Michael Hall, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 562 U.S. 981, 131 S. Ct. 414,

178 L. Ed. 2d 322,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8138. October 18, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 597 F.3d 746.
